attributes.action: Travesty of Justice over Aysha King
attributes.additional_details: The arrest and separation of Aysha Kings parents from their little boy is a complete travesty of justice and heavy handed. They need all the support they can get and be reunited with their child as soon as possible. They have a right to a family life under the Human Rights Act and be shown compassion, not treated as criminals.

rejection.details: There is already a petition calling for the family to be reunited and for them to receive support.
